update.description:
I'm moving `ign-launch` to be part of `ign-tools`. The first step is to upgrade ign-tools to ign-cmake2. This PR removes the `cmake` directory and updates the main `CMakeLists.txt` file.

This PR requires #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/140
update.title: Updating to use ignition cmake 2

content.raw: I [updated](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/156/msgs5-depend-on-tools1/diff) `ign-msgs5` to use `ign-tools1` using this PR and everything worked. LGTM.
content.html: I updated ign-msgs5 to use ign-tools1 using this PR and everything worked. LGTM.

content.raw:
In general looks good to me. CI is failing in two scenarios:

* Linux : is waiting for the \`tools/cppcheck.bash\` script to be present in this repo. I assume that we will include it once the source files will be present in the repo.
* Mac:  cmake2 needs to be the dependencies for this change: [https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/851](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/851)

‌
content.html:
In general looks good to me. CI is failing in two scenarios:

  • Linux : is waiting for the `tools/cppcheck.bash` script to be present in this repo. I assume that we will include it once the source files will be present in the repo.
  • Mac: cmake2 needs to be the dependencies for this change: https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/851

‌

content.raw: Should we install `libignition-cmake2-dev` in `bitbucket-pipelines`?
content.html: Should we install libignition-cmake2-dev in bitbucket-pipelines?

content.raw: `include` doesn't have anything useful either. Not sure if `ign-cmake ` will be happy without an `include` directory.
content.html: include doesn't have anything useful either. Not sure if ign-cmake will be happy without an include directory.

content.raw: What about removing the `tools` directory as well? There's no `c++`  code in this repository.
content.html: What about removing the tools directory as well? There's no c++ code in this repository.

content.raw: Should we also remove the `test` directory? I don’t think we’re running any tests.
content.html: Should we also remove the test directory? I don’t think we’re running any tests.

content.raw: Should we remove the `doc` directory?
content.html: Should we remove the doc directory?
